mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board( bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt ) VALUES ( tbl_board_seq.nextval,'${title}','${content}','${writer}', sysdate ,0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET title = '${title}' , content = '${content}' ,writer = '${writer}' WHERE bno = #{bno}
